mapper.select: SELECT admin_number, admin_id, admin_passwd FROM tbl_admin WHERE admin_id = #{id} AND admin_passwd = #{pw}
SELECT user_number, user_nickname, user_tier, user_phone, user_join_date, user_ben_cnt FROM tbl_user

SELECT f.forum_number, f.forum_category, f.forum_title, f.forum_date, u.user_nickname, u.user_tier FROM tbl_forum f INNER JOIN tbl_user u ON f.user_number = u.user_number WHERE f.forum_category = '모집' order by f.forum_number desc
SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_forum WHERE forum_category = '모집'

SELECT f.forum_number, f.forum_category, f.forum_title, f.forum_date, u.user_nickname, u.user_tier FROM tbl_forum f INNER JOIN tbl_user u ON f.user_number = u.user_number WHERE f.forum_category NOT LIKE '모집'
select count(*) from tbl_forum where forum_category = '자유'
SELECT count(*) FROM TBL_FORUM WHERE TO_CHAR(FORUM_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-#{day},'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT COUNT(USER_TIER) count FROM TBL_USER WHERE USER_TIER = #{tier}
SELECT COUNT(FORUM_CATEGORY) count FROM TBL_FORUM WHERE FORUM_CATEGORY = #{category}
select user_number, user_nickname, user_tier, user_phone, user_join_date, user_ben_cnt from tbl_user where user_nickname like '%'||#{userNickname}||'%' order by user_number
